      • runTimer

        void runTimer(BasePlugin plugin,
              Runnable runnable,
              long delay,
              long interval)
        Parameters:
        plugin - the reference to the plugin scheduling task
        runnable - the task to be run
        delay - the delay in TICKS
        interval - the ticks to wait between runs
